name: Smash Table
description:
1. Pong : The ever classic game Ping Pong or Pong, there will be two pads. One of the player and the other will be of the computer. The main goal will be to hit the ball to the side of either player ie. Player to hit on wall of computer and computer to hit on the wall of player to score points. The player who'll score 5 points first wins the match.
  2. Finger Soccer : It's the same game concept as soccer. There will be 1 piece each for player to play as team player. The one who'll score 5+ points first will win.
  3. Will come soon : - - - -
